QuestData.Title: Stones of Binding
QuestData.Description: The Shattered Hand has discovered increased collaboration between Twilight's Hammer and the Dark Iron dwarves in Blackrock Depths. We have an opportunity to strike at our enemies and empower ourselves, $n.$B$BTwilight's Hammer followers have placed a number of elemental binding stones throughout Shadowforge City, the Domicile, the Shrine of Thaurissan, the West Garrison and the East Garrison. Find and capture those stones!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 6 Elemental Binding Stones from Blackrock Depths. You can find the stones in Shadowforge City, the Domicile, the Shrine of Thaurissan, the East Garrison, and the West Garrison.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to find those binding stones?
